question: Which Indian cricketer became the second fastest player to score 2000 ODI runs?
explanation: Smriti Mandhana has become the second-fastest Indian player to reach 2000 one-day international runs. She managed to break Kohli\'s record .The 23-year-old has taken 51 innings to reach the 2,000-ODI run mark becoming the third-fastest woman after Belinda Clark and Meg Lanning to achieve the milestone. She has scored four centuries and 17 fifties till now in her ODI career. Shikhar Dhawan is the only Indian to reach the landmark in 48 innings, While Virat Kohli touched the mark in 53 innings.
